Name: Nightmare Zone
About the game: Nightmare Zone is an Indie Horror Game made by two people. The dream World is like a big room, with doors on each sides: every door is a portal for a dream. Run Away from your Nightmares, explore all the areas of the dream World and find the doors to escape. You can escape only if you can find all the doors. Can you wake up? Something is looking for you. Will you be able to find in succession all 5 doors needed to wake up without getting caught by the demons that inhabit the nightmares? Many others before you have tried to escape the Nightmare Zone. You'll have to be fast and brave to be among the lucky few to wake up again.
